attributes.action: Sentence mothers for aiding their childs murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mothers should be held responsible for the murder of their children by violent partners if they knowingly turn a blind eye, and neglect their child.  The mothers should receive a lengthy prison sentence and sterilized.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
